name: Alien Wall - Brick Invader
description:
Alien Wall

Alien Wall is a great genre mix between a 'brick breaker' and a ‘galaxy invader’ / ‘shoot em up’ type of game.

It’s packed with extra weapons and highly dynamical levels. Wipe out all aliens level by level using your spaceship combined with power full extra weapons.

Extra Weapons

  • Power Bursts
  • Plasma Laser Cannon
  • Self Shooting Plasma Balls
  • Gravity Items
  • Power Barrier
  • Instant plasma ball push
  • NO Power Downs

Extra Weapon Activation

Decide on your own which extra weapon you would like to use. Press the shortcut key 1-6 to activate the weapon of your choice.
Collect energy pods to fill up your extra weapon power.

Plasma-Ball Control

Use your spaceship to control your plasma balls. Decide how many plasma balls you can handle at once ( left mouse button releases a new plasma-ball ). You can use any number of the remaining plasma balls at your wish.

Space Ship

Your spaceship has the control of the plasma-balls.
  • speed them up by moving up while you hit it
  • slow them down by moving down while you hit it
  • control deflection angle by moving left/right while you hit it
  • Hold the shift key + move your mouse left/right to change the direction of up-flying plasma-balls slightly.
Alien Wall is the perfect choice for all fans of retro arcade ‘brick breaking’ and ‘shoot em up’ type of games.
